```{r}
# script_dir <- dirname(rstudioapi::getSourceEditorContext()$path)
root_dir <- getwd()
project_directory<-dirname(root_dir)
data_dir <- file.path(project_directory, 'raw-data')
curated_data_dir <- file.path(project_directory, 'curated-data')

data_file_name<-'Consent.csv'

consent_data<-read.csv(file.path(data_dir,data_file_name),stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# names(consent_data)
colnames(consent_data)<-c(1:14)
consent_data <- consent_data[-c(1:67), ]
consent_data<- consent_data %>%
  select(1, 8, 10, 13)
colnames(consent_data)<-c("SubjectID", "Email", "WorkDay", "DeadlineDay")

file_name='MailerLite.csv'
write.csv(consent_data,file.path(curated_data_dir, file_name), row.names = FALSE)
```
